mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_REPLY (BOOK_NO, MEMBER_ID, BOOK_REPLY_CONTENT, BOOK_REPLY_CREATED, BOOK_RATING) VALUES (#{bookNo}, #{memberId}, #{bookReplyContent}, now(), #{bookRating})
mapper.select: SELECT BOOK_REPLY_NO, BOOK_NO, MEMBER_ID, BOOK_REPLY_CONTENT, BOOK_REPLY_CREATED, BOOK_RATING FROM BOOK_REPLY ORDER BY BOOK_REPLY_NO LIMIT #{beginRecord}, #{recordPerPage}
